relevant_rule: patent presumed valid unless proven otherwise
application_details: Apotex's product uses drospirenone dissolved in a matrix, not micronized as claimed in the '426 patent
decision_reasoning: Bayer failed to prove that this form infringes the claims at issue
cause_of_action: prohibition of Apotex obtaining approval for its generic version of YAZ until the '426 patent expired
procedure_steps: eligibility of the patent for listing under NOC Regulations
